mapper.sql: id, create_date, update_date, data_status, desp, departure_province_id, departure_city_id, departure_area_id, destination_province_id, destination_city_id, destination_area_id, car_type_id, tyre_no, car_length, goods_type, weight, goods_units, deliver_date, costs, remark, status, shipper_id, insurance_id, repeat_flag, use_type_id, length, width, height, handling_type_id, payment_type_id, auth_status, auth_date, order_no, company_id
mapper.select:
select a.id, a.create_date as createDate, a.update_date as updateDate, a.departure_province_id as departureProvinceId, a.departure_city_id as departureCityId, a.departure_area_id as departureAreaId, a.destination_province_id as destinationProvinceId, a.destination_city_id as destinationCityId, a.destination_area_id as destinationAreaId, a.car_type_id as carTypeId, a.tyre_no as tyreNo, a.car_length as carLength, a.goods_type goodsType, a.weight, a.goods_units as goodsUnits, a.deliver_date deliverDate, a.costs, a.remark, a.status, a.shipper_id as shipperId, a.insurance_id, a.repeat_flag as repeatFlag, a.use_type_id as useTypeId, a.length, a.width, a.height, a.handling_type_id as handlingTypeId, a.payment_type_id as paymentTypeId, a.auth_status as authStatus, a.auth_date authDate, a.order_no orderNo, a.company_id as companyId, b.mobile as mobile, b.name as name, c.name as companyName from t_order a left join t_user b on a.shipper_id = b.id left join t_company c on a.company_id = c.id where 1=1
and a.order_no like concat('%',#{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and b.mobile like concat('%',#{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and c.name like concat('%',#{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')

select a.id, a.create_date as createDate, a.update_date as updateDate, a.departure_province_id as departureProvinceId, a.departure_city_id as departureCityId, a.departure_area_id as departureAreaId, a.destination_province_id as destinationProvinceId, a.destination_city_id as destinationCityId, a.destination_area_id as destinationAreaId, a.car_type_id as carTypeId, a.tyre_no as tyreNo, a.car_length as carLength, a.goods_type goodsType, a.weight, a.goods_units as goodsUnits, a.deliver_date deliverDate, a.costs, a.remark, a.status, a.shipper_id, a.insurance_id, a.repeat_flag as repeatFlag, a.use_type_id as useTypeId, a.length, a.width, a.height, a.handling_type_id as handlingTypeId, a.payment_type_id as paymentTypeId, a.auth_status as authStatus, a.auth_date authDate, a.order_no orderNo, a.company_id as companyId, b.name as name, b.mobile as mobile, c.name as companyName from t_order a left join t_user b on a.shipper_id = b.id left join t_company c on a.company_id = c.id where a.id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
